ThingDef.label: Botox Plant
ThingDef.description: A strange plant that grows little flesh colored fruits. Created by Glitter World technology, the inside of these fruits are engineered to attract Clostridium botulinum bacteria. What is called Botox is actually the toxic spores of the Botox bacterium; this substance is officially called "BOtulinum TOXins". By the time the fruit is ripe, the bacteria within have successfully produced large amounts of concentrated Botox through their spores.
